note: I've worn a lot of hats, but even when I was driving a truck... I considered myself a writer. I'm 77 and a lifetime meditator. I began meditating in order to control my temper and enhance my creativity. To my great surprise, I was blessed with some meditative visions of the mechanical workings of this “Reality,” its relationship to all living things within it, and a glimpse of a possible better future. I simply wish to tell the people of the world what I saw and how it relates to them.
